subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets  are finding impressive replacements for the injured Jon Niese and John Maine, such as Hisanori Takahashi, who pitched six scoreless innings for the second consecutive outing.
snippet: The Mets  are finding impressive replacements for the injured Jon Niese and John Maine, such as Hisanori Takahashi, who pitched six scoreless innings for the second consecutive outing.
